author: cnbc.com
title: Acme United Corporation First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call
text:
FAIRFIELD, Conn., April 16, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Acme United Corporation (NYSE American:ACU) will release its financial results for the First Quarter of 2018 on Friday, April 20, 2018, at 9:00 a.m. EDT.
A conference call to discuss these results will be broadcast over the Internet on Friday, April 20, 2018, at 12:00 p.m. EDT. To listen or participate in a question and answer session, dial 866-289-0438. International callers may dial 323-794-2423. Access to the live webcast of the conference call can be found in the Investor Relations section of the Company’s website, www.acmeunited.com . A replay may be accessed under Investor Relations, Audio Archives.
Acme United Corporation is a leading worldwide supplier of innovative safety solutions and cutting technology to the school, home, office, hardware, sporting goods and industrial markets. Its leading brands include First Aid Only ®, Physicians Care ®, Pac-Kit ®, Spill Magic ®, Westcott ®, Clauss ®, Camillus ®, Cuda ®, and DMT ®.
